Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Humbly \Hum"bly\, adv. With humility; lowly. --Pope. [1913 Webster]
humbly adv 1: in a humble manner; "he humbly lowered his head" [syn: {meekly}] 2: in a miserly manner; "they lived meanly and without ostentation" [syn: {meanly}]
